SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:IF &UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY# NE "" : DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,100 : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH : SET &UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) :ENDIF
:SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS if [ "$ISFILE" -eq "1" ] ; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Actions Temp Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY# is a file" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER exit 1 fi if [ "$EXIST" -eq "0" ] ; then mkdir -p "&UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY#" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL fi
